Package org.phantomapi.gui

Full, robust gui api using inventories.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Dialog
    Dialogs
    Element
    A GUI Element.
    SelectDialog<T>
    Selection dialog
    Window
    A Window which holds element objects.

    PhantomDialog

    PhantomElement
    Element implementation
    PhantomSelectDialog<T>
